SEARCH
Package gw.api.validation

Class ValidationUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.validation.ValidationUtil
public class ValidationUtil extends Object
Provides static methods for validation of CC entities.
Author:
cgross

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    clearValidationErrors()
    A method that clears all validation errors from a particular webpage.
    static ValidationLevel[]
    getValidationLevelsInReverseOrder(ValidationLevel[] exclude)
    Returns an array of ValidationLevels in reverse priority order, except for those retired or those given in the exclude array.
    protected static void
    showValidationErrors(Validatable bean, ValidationResult vr, ValidationLevel validationLevelTarget)
    Displays the errors or warnings for the given ValidationResult at the specified ValidationLevel.

    Validate the given claim at the given validation level, but do not validate its exposures.

  • Method Details

    • getValidationLevelsInReverseOrder

      public static ValidationLevel[] getValidationLevelsInReverseOrder(ValidationLevel[] exclude)
      Returns an array of ValidationLevels in reverse priority order, except for those retired or those given in the exclude array.
      Parameters:
      exclude - a non null, but possibly empty, array of validation levels to exclude from the result
      Returns:
      all non retired validation levels in reverse priority order, except for those given in the exclude arrary

    • clearValidationErrors

      public static void clearValidationErrors()
      A method that clears all validation errors from a particular webpage.

    • validatePolicyForClaim

      public static void validatePolicyForClaim(Claim claim, ValidationLevel level)
      Validate the given claim's policy at the given validation level.
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim whose policy is to be validated
      level - the validation level, errors or warnings at higher levels will be ignored

    • validateExposureUnit

      public static void validateExposureUnit(Exposure exposure, ValidationLevel level)
      Validate the given exposure at the given validation level.
      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure to be validated
      level - the validation level, errors or warnings at higher levels will be ignored

    • validateClaim

      public static void validateClaim(Claim claim, ValidationLevel level)
      Validate the given claim at the given validation level, but do not validate its exposures.
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to be validated
      level - the validation level, errors or warnings at higher levels will be ignored

    • validateClaimAndExposures

      public static void validateClaimAndExposures(Claim claim, ValidationLevel level)
      Validate the given claim and all its exposures at the given validation level.
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to be validated
      level - the validation level, errors or warnings at higher levels will be ignored

    • showValidationErrors

      protected static void showValidationErrors(Validatable bean, ValidationResult vr, ValidationLevel validationLevelTarget)
      Displays the errors or warnings for the given ValidationResult at the specified ValidationLevel.
      Parameters:
      bean - if there is an error or warning, an EntityValidationException associated with this bean's ID will be created
      vr - the ValidationResult to display errors or warnings for
      validationLevelTarget - ValidationLevel at which errors or warnings should be displayed
